items.title: Brooks Koepka Tied For Lead Heading Into Sunday At The French Open.
items.excerpt: 2025 has been a challenging year for five-time major winner Brooks Koepka. The former number one player in the world missed the cut in three of four majors this season and finished the LIV season in 31st place, with only two top 10 finishes on the year.

items.title: RFK Jr.'s vaccine panel weakens Covid shot recommendations, calling it an individual decision
items.excerpt: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s hand-picked vaccine panel on Friday weakened Covid shot recommendations in the U.S., advising that all Americans consult a health-care provider before deciding whether to receive the vaccine.

items.title: Ministers yet to seek climate advice on Heathrow expansion
items.excerpt: The UK government's climate change advisory panel has said it has not yet been asked to formally assess how plans to expand Heathrow airport would impact on carbon emissions targets.

items.title: 'Labour must step up to help JLR supply chain'
